column4: does anyone know what i can do to make my computer faster? I have 256 gb ram (running alternated ubuntu 9.10) and have already done swapdisk (2.5gb-seperate harddrive)
could you please use a more family-friendly nick?
its not like "gay" is an insult either. however, we have rules in here about family-friendly language. thatd put swear words and sexual things right out.
